differences.actualValue: <speak>In a few words, how can I help you with your current order. You can say things like, the order was already picked up by someone else, ore, problem with customers address.</speak>

text.text: I forgot my card at home

differences.actualValue: <speak>I think you're calling because you don't have the Plus card with you, is that correct?</speak>

text: <speak>I think you're calling because you don't have the Plus card with you, is that correct?</speak>

userUtterance.text: I forgot my card at home

agentUtterance.text: <speak>I think you're calling because you don't have the Plus card with you, is that correct?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I understand you don't have the Plus Card. If you want, you can choose to use your own payment method to complete this delivery, and get reimbursed later. In the app, you can change the payment method, from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. For more information on how this works, say, reimbursement info. Or, to learn how to stop receiving this type of delivery job in the future, you can say, job preferences.<break time="750ms"/></speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. </speak>

text: <speak>I understand you don't have the Plus Card. If you want, you can choose to use your own payment method to complete this delivery, and get reimbursed later. In the app, you can change the payment method, from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. For more information on how this works, say, reimbursement info. Or, to learn how to stop receiving this type of delivery job in the future, you can say, job preferences.<break time="750ms"/></speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>To turn off <break time="100ms"/> Order and Pay, or, Shop and Pay <break time="150ms"/> until you get a new card, go to Driving Preferences in your app. From there, you can turn off those delivery jobs. You can turn them back on at anytime.<break time="750ms"/></speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>
